ygData.subject: Re: FEW QUESTIONS
ygData.msgSnippet: I play on ECI and I have a bunch of extra WORDS including 1 for the L16 restless bones spell.  My character name is Skel   /tell me if you want to hook up.
ygData.messageBody:
I play on ECI and I have a bunch of extra WORDS including 1 for the L16
restless bones spell. My character name is Skel /tell me if you want to
hook up.

Also does anyone know what is up w/ WORD od DOMINION? since it WAS for
charm and charm is gone is it useless?

As for research, it is not bad, I have tried to make spells 3 times and 1
time succeded and the other 2 my skill went up, so try try again. I think
you have a better chance of researching spells if you are at the higher end
of your RANK.

----- Original Message -----
From: wolfie <lachdanan@...>
To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, July 12, 1999 7:01 PM
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] FEW QUESTIONS


> From: wolfie <lachdanan@...>
>
> Im in Povar, New L16 Gnome necro, and cannot locate two spells; Banshee
> Aura and Restless Bones. Gnome guild doesn't have these. Where can I
find
> them? How best to and get them?
>
> How best to control a pet, such as in Unrest? While in the Castle in CB
it
> ran away and I lost 2 pets that way. Would not respond to commands even
> tho alive. I found a L16 spell not familiar with; Spirit Armor? And
> lastly, with Heat Blood, Engulf Darkness, and Heart Flutter, if all
stacked
> about how much damage done?
>
> Thanks for any help!
>
> PS
>
> As I go up it appears its better strategy to make max use of pet and not
do
> much melee; if so, how best to heal pet, and do I med, if possible, while
> he fites (keeping a chk on health), then heal him up?
>
>
> --------------------------- ONElist Sponsor ----------------------------
>
> ONElist: your connection to people who share your interests.
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> This list is basically unmoderated. However abusive language will not be
tolerated
>
